response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value and potential impact, I'm offering it to you at an exclusive price of $9,500. This represents a significant saving compared to its market value of $10,000, while still ensuring a fair return for us. I trust this offer will be mutually beneficial. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information.", "product_price": 9500}
